name: cmc_compare_coins
description: Compare multiple cryptocurrencies side by side by scraping their CoinMarketCap pages in parallel. Returns price, market cap, volume, and price changes for each coin.

detailSteps.code: var h1 = document.querySelector('h1'); var nameEl = document.querySelector('[data-role="coin-name"]') || (h1 ? h1.querySelector('span') : null) || h1; var symbolEl = document.querySelector('[data-role="coin-symbol"]') || (h1 ? h1.querySelector('small') : null); var priceEl = document.querySelector('[data-test="text-cdp-price-display"]'); if (!priceEl) { var spans = document.querySelectorAll('span'); for (var si = 0; si < spans.length; si++) { var txt = spans[si].textContent.trim(); if (/^\$[\d,.]+/.test(txt) && spans[si].closest('h1, h2, [data-test]')) { priceEl = spans[si]; break; } } } var changeEl = document.querySelector('[data-test="text-cdp-price-change"]'); var bodyText = document.body.innerText; var mcMatch = bodyText.match(/Market [Cc]ap[^$]*?(\$[\d,.]+[BMTK]?)/); var volMatch = bodyText.match(/Volume \(24h\)[^$]*?(\$[\d,.]+[BMTK]?)/); var supMatch = bodyText.match(/Circulating Supply[^\d]*([\d,.]+\s*[A-Z]*)/); var rankMatch = bodyText.match(/Rank\s*#?(\d+)/i); return { name: nameEl ? nameEl.textContent.trim() : '', symbol: symbolEl ? symbolEl.textContent.trim() : '', price: priceEl ? priceEl.textContent.trim() : '', change_24h: changeEl ? changeEl.textContent.trim() : '', market_cap: mcMatch ? mcMatch[1] : '', volume_24h: volMatch ? volMatch[1] : '', circulating_supply: supMatch ? supMatch[1] : '', rank: rankMatch ? '#' + rankMatch[1] : '', url: window.location.href }
